Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-46137 affecting package python-twisted for versions less than 22.10.0-4
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-46137 affecting package python-twisted for versions less than 22.10.0-4. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package python-twisted is earlier than 22.10.0-4, affected by CVE-2023-46137
